name: Boing Delivery
description:
A truck simulation game with crazy bounciness. Players are going to drive the truck and bring loads safely to the destination in time. However, don't drop more than 5 loads! and you are going to lose your job. Forever. Go over some small to big hills, take control of your weird-somewhat janky truck bouncing. 

  • Time Limit(3 minutes)
  • Bouncy truck
  • Obstacles(Hill)
  • Speed control
  • Loads count
